item.title: service
item.dc:creator: jianhaoc06
item.content:encoded:
Types Of Car Service We have more than 2,000 stores around the world, which can provide you with vehicle repair services in a timely manner, and provide door-to-door repairs, and car-to-home services Contact Us
Innovative Car Wash System Smart 360™ Technology enables the car wash system to be responsive to the dynamic conditions in the wash bay and allows it to “think for itself”, increasing up-time and optimizing the wash process.
Car Repair and Services We provide exquisite and thoughtful car body and interior repair, cleaning, and service
Body Repair We provide car paint repair, film, custom car interior decoration, replacement, engine maintenance, our professional maintenance personnel can repair the damage of any part of the car for you.
customize Car We provide replacements for car seat covers and interiors. You can choose or customize the exterior color and interior materials of your car.
Rent a Car
We have nearly 2,000 offline stores that provide car rental services. You can complete the car selection and reservation process by phone or online. We will have someone to deliver your rental car to your premises. You can also choose the nearest store to you. Pick up the car in person more
Image from Freepik
Finding the best car insurance company for you Pricing and discounts made up a portion of each insurer’s score, but we know that cost is the top factor for many auto insurance shoppers. Since pricing is based on personal factors including your age, location, vehicle and credit history and gender (in most cases), it’s important to shop around for car insurance quotes. If price is the most important factor in your search, comparing car insurance quotes can help you find the cheapest rate. But your shopping experience will also shed light on a company’s customer service standards.
To find the top car insurance companies:
Visit your state insurance commissioner’s website to find complaints and other information about companies in your area. Ask your agent or a customer service representative any questions you have to make sure you’re getting all the coverage you need — and nothing you don’t want. Consider smaller insurance companies, too. Small companies offer rates well below large competitors in many locations. If you’ve had tickets, DUIs or other violations, be sure to shop three and five years after the incident, when surcharges can drop significantly.

If price is the most important factor in your search, comparing car insurance quotes can help you find the cheapest rate. But your shopping experience will also shed light on a company’s customer service standards.
To find the top car insurance companies:

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: jianhaoc06
item.content:encoded:
Finding the best car service company for you Founded in 1972, Sunshine has so far had more than 2,000 offline stores and hundreds of community car service stations around the world. We provide high-quality services such as car maintenance, insurance, sales, luxury car storage, etc., and have received continuous praise for decades If price is the most important factor in your search, comparing car service quotes can help you find the cheapest rate. But your shopping experience will also shed light on a company’s customer service standards.
Team content Our professional team have the capabilities to service all passenger cars, light, medium and heavy duty trucks "be best car service company"
#1 Car care Awarded "Best Service Brand" and "Best After-sales Company" by "car" and "home of car" magazines
#5 Five minutes service No matter where you are, once you need any car service (repair, insurance, maintenance), numerous offline stores will let us arrive and serve you within five minutes
#2500 Service Shop Founded in 1972, Sunshine has so far had more than 2,500 offline stores and hundreds of community car service stations around the world
Our CEO Bruce(Chen Jianhao):Bachelor of information technology -James Cook univercity(2019-2022)Master of  Business administration- University of Toronto（2023—2025）Doctor of Business administration- University College London(2025-2029)Mercedes-Benz-After Sales Manager (2029-2031)Audi-Business Director (2031-2032)
"be best car service company"  Bruce has set this sentence as the company’s slogan and value since the beginning of the company’s establishment,He took over the company from his grandfather.“We want this company to shine like sunshine on every customer and family who owns a car， provide the best car services to them.”When Bruce worked at Mercedes-Benz, he found that there was no car service brand or company that was credible among consumers. He wanted to build such a platform. Instead of being a profitable listed company, Bruce wanted to let everyone own it. The car’s family and individual have a trusted partner. He hopes that the relationship between customers and sunshine car is more like a partner than a consumer and a business.
Our Team Our automotive engineers and service teams are from major automotive brands, to provide you with the most professional and caring services read more
We have expanded our services to include motor storage
Close to 20 years ago, we realized that there was no safe roadside assistance geared solely for motorcycles. Having seen too many bikes being chained, dangerously, to the tow bars of regular tow trucks, and extensive market research, we started our company...
Quality service Sample text. Click to select the text box. Click again or double click to start editing the text. view all services Images from Freepik
Complete car care centers, over 700 locations nationwide
Wide range of preventative maintenance to car repair service
Quality service from Car Care Pros since 1972!
